Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. It comes with a wide range of features designed to enhance your experience and meet your needs. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can purchase this product for $150. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience at a special discounted rate. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
